We admire elephants in part because they demonstrate what we consider the finest human traits: empathy, self-awareness, and social intelligence. But the way we treat them puts on display the very worst of human behaviour -- Graydon Carter

Elephants are more intelligent than we've realised. Over the last decade, studies have shown much about their emotions, intelligence and social behaviours, and revealed that they're smarter than previously thought and share greater similarities to us than we believed. And in a world where
